subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Coach killers are not rebel players or doomed franchises or the injury fates. What kills a coach most often is N.F.L. parity, or socialized football brought to you by the hard salary cap.
snippet: Coach killers are not rebel players or doomed franchises or the injury fates. What kills a coach most often is N.F.L. parity, or socialized football brought to you by the hard salary cap.
